output_list.reason: The mintToken function does not check for overflow, allowing the owner to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens to any user account, causing a buy price to devalue.
The burn function does not check for overflow, allowing the owner to burn an arbitrary amount of tokens from any user account, causing a buy price to devalue.
The transferFrom function does not check for overflow, allowing a user to transfer an arbitrary amount of tokens to any user account, causing a buy price to devalue.
The transfer function does not check for overflow, allowing a user to transfer an arbitrary amount of tokens to any user account, causing a buy price to devalue.
The buy function does not check for overflow, allowing a user to buy an arbitrary amount of tokens, causing a buy price to devalue.
